title: Hog Slaughterers
medium: etching, roulette, and mezzotint with burnishing printed in black ink on laid paper
dimensions: sheet: 16 × 16 cm (6 5/16 × 6 5/16 in.) cut within platemark
attribution: Cornelis Ploos van Amstel (editor) and Bernhard Schreuder (printmaker), after Gerard ter Borch the Younger (formerly Jan Pietersz Saenredam)
creditline: Gift of Sherwood B. Smith, Jr.
